headline: Biden and Harris Made a Joint Appearance
description: President Biden and Kamala Harris appeared together in Maryland, focusing on prescription drug cost negotiations and marking a significant moment for Harris as Biden ends his bid for re-election.
newsletter_headline: Biden and Harris Made a Joint Appearance
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Ukraine said it had captured a Russian town. Here’s the latest at the end of Thursday.

headline: Ukraine said it had captured a Russian town
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky announced Ukrainian troops had taken full control of the Russian town of Sudzha, marking a potential first since the incursion began 10 days ago.

headline: A pain-free alternative to the Pap smear will soon arrive
description: Starting this fall, American women will be able to use a simple swab to screen for cervical cancer, an alternative to the Pap smear found to be just as effective at preventing cancer.

headline: Five people were charged in the death of Matthew Perry
description: Matthew Perry’s personal assistant, two doctors and two others have been charged with providing the ketamine that caused his death in October.
